faqs.answer: Embeddable widgets with conversions built in.
faqs.question: What is Clickeen?

faqs.answer: Yes, one active widget with core features.
faqs.question: Is there a free plan?

faqs.answer: Copy the embed code and paste it before </body> on your site.
faqs.question: How do I install a widget?

faqs.answer: Because Clickeen is an amazing new platform to make the web beautiful and easy to use.
faqs.question: Why should I use Clickeen

html: <tooldrawer-field class='diet-object-manager' type='object-manager' path='sections' add-label='Add section' reorder-label='Manage sections' reorder-title='Manage sections' label-path='title' index-token='__SECTION__' default-item='{"title":"All Questions","faqs":[{"question":"New question","answer":"New answer","defaultOpen":false}]}' template='<tooldrawer-field type="repeater" path="sections.__SECTION__.faqs" label="Questions" label-key="faq.item" label-params="{&quot;count&quot;:2}" add-label="Add question" add-label-key="faq.actions.addItem" add-label-params="{&quot;item&quot;:{&quot;$t&quot;:&quot;faq.item&quot;,&quot;count&quot;:1}}" labelPath="sections.__SECTION__.title" labelInputLabel="Section" labelPlaceholder="All Questions" labelSize="lg" default-item="{&quot;question&quot;:&quot;New question&quot;,&quot;answer&quot;:&quot;New answer&quot;,&quot;defaultOpen&quot;:false}" template='<div class="diet-repeater__item-body"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit diet-popover-host" data-size="md" data-state="closed"><div class="diet-dropdown-header diet-dropdown-edit__control" role="button" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-expanded="false"><span class="diet-dropdown-header-label label-s">Q:</span><span class="diet-dropdown-header-value body-s" data-muted="true" data-placeholder="Type your question">Type your question</span></div><div class="diet-popover" role="dialog" aria-label="Question"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">Q:</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="textformat.size.larger"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body diet-dropdown-edit__body"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__main"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__editor body-xsmall" contenteditable="true">Type your question</div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__palette"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__toolbarrow"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--format"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="bold"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="bold"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="italic"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="italic"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="underline"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-links"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="personalhotspot.slash"></span></button></div></div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__linksheet" aria-hidden="true"><div class="diet-popaddlink diet-popover" data-state="empty"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">Add URL</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger diet-popaddlink__close" data-size="xs" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="multiply"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body"><div class="diet-textfield" data-size="md"><label class="diet-textfield__control"><span /></label><span class="diet-textfield__helper caption diet-popaddlink__helper"></span></div><div class="diet-popaddlink__actions"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-txt diet-popaddlink__apply" data-size="md" data-variant="primary"><span class="diet-btn-txt__label">Apply</span></button></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><input type="hidden" class="diet-dropdown-edit__field" value="Type your question" data-bob-path="sections.__SECTION__.faqs.__INDEX__.question" /></div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit diet-popover-host" data-size="md" data-state="closed"><div <tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' databinding='title' path='title' label='FAQ title' hint='Frequently Asked Questions' value='{{title}}' show-if="showTitle == true" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='displayCategoryTitles' label='Show section title' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandFirst' label='Open first question by default' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.multiOpen' label='Allow multiple open' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandAll' label='Expand all questions' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingLinked' label='Link item padding' value='{{layout.itemPaddingLinked}}' default='true' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='layout.itemPadding' label='Item padding (px)' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == true" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingTop' label='Item top padding (px)' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == false" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingRight' label='Item right padding (px)' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == false" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingBottom' label='Item bottom padding (px)' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == false" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingLeft' label='Item left padding (px)' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == false" />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Item background' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.linkStyle' label='Link style' value='{{appearance.linkStyle}}' options='[{"label":"Underline","value":"underline"},{"label":"Highlight","value":"highlight"},{"label":"Color","value":"color"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.linkUnderlineColor' label='Underline color' value='{{appearance.linkUnderlineColor}}' show-if="appearance.linkStyle == 'underline'" />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.linkHighlightColor' label='Highlight color' value='{{appearance.linkHighlightColor}}' show-if="appearance.linkStyle == 'highlight'" />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.linkTextColor' label='Link text color' value='{{appearance.linkTextColor}}' show-if="appearance.linkStyle == 'color'" />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.iconStyle' label='Accordion icon' placeholder='Choose icon' value='{{appearance.iconStyle}}' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" options='[{"label":"Plus","value":"plus"},{"label":"Chevron","value":"chevron"},{"label":"Arrow One","value":"arrow"},{"label":"Arrow Two","value":"arrowshape"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='typography.roles.title.color' label='Title text color' value='{{typography.roles.title.color}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='typography.roles.section.color' label='Section title color' value='{{typography.roles.section.color}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='typography.roles.question.color' label='Question text color' value='{{typography.roles.question.color}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='typography.roles.answer.color' label='Answer text color' value='{{typography.roles.answer.color}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked' label='Link item corners' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radius' label='Corner radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radius}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == true" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusTL' label='Item top-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusTL}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusTR' label='Item top-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusTR}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusBR' label='Item bottom-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusBR}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusBL' label='Item bottom-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusBL}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.border' label='Item border' value='{{appearance.itemCard.border}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.shadow' label='Item shadow' value='{{appearance.itemCard.shadow}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='pod.background' label='Pod background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='seoGeo.enabled' label='Enable SEO/GEO optimization' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='seo.businessType' label='Business type' value='{{seo.businessType}}' options='[{"label":"Online service","value":"online-service"},{"label":"Product seller","value":"product-seller"},{"label":"Local business","value":"local"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' path='seo.canonicalUrl' label='Canonical URL' placeholder='https://example.com/page' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='geo.answerFormat' label='Answer format' value='{{geo.answerFormat}}' options='[{"label":"Direct-first","value":"direct-first"},{"label":"Detailed","value":"detailed"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='geo.enableDeepLinks' label='Enable deep links' />
